post.author: pistonfan92
post.body:
hey everyone! i have made lots of posts before in the "doom 3 discussion". i have FINALLY figured out how to export my blend files. im so happy. well anyways, i have encountered another problem. and i posted this in my previous posts in "doom 3 discussion". so i figured this would be the best place to post this problem, because it deals with textures. wow i am smart. ok, my problem is when start up my awesome game, doom 3, ( DOOM 4 IS ON ITS WAY ), and then when i spawn my monster which is the hell knight, hes all black and has no texture. also (i think this is the right term) he has no collision. i cannot shoot him or punch him. but i think i can bump into him lol. here is the type of texture i want for this hellknight. . i want that kind of a shiny look. like a reptile. do you people have any idea what i could do to fix this? is there some type of material editor out there? and if you have another forum where it deals with this problem also, or a bette rplace to post this. feel free to share. PLEase share. i will look for some too. so dont say. DO IT YOURSELF ...........sry



peace

post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body:
This is why we don't crosspost. I just answered your question but in a separate thread...

viewtopic.php?p=200344#p200344
